name: Infinite Maze
description:
Infinite Maze is a fast and easy to play maze game that is fun for all ages. A new maze is uniquely generated each time you play, making no two mazes ever the same! A wide variety of colorful themes make the mazes not only unique, but beautiful. You can even use photos from your photo library.

To play, just tilt your iPhone or iPod Touch to guide your marble through the labyrinth to the maze exit. You'll be amazed at how realistically the ball moves through the maze and how natural it feels. You can adjust the difficulty to accommodate players of every skill level - from small children to expert maze masters.

Features

* each maze is unique, for infinite levels
* realistic ball physics
* 4 different levels of difficulty
* remembers your best time at each difficulty
* can use your own photo as background
* starts quickly, easy to play

Double tap anywhere on the maze to bring up the high scores and settings.

Infinite Mazes is built with an advanced physics engine and OpenGL rendering for fast, smooth, realistic gameplay. You'll love this little game! No learning curve, just start and go.

**UPDATE**
1.0.3 submitted and approved, should fix up folks with Huge Mazes and Balls going through walls on Huge Mazes
